sections.text:
31-542.Sanitary district; activities; discontinuance; trustees subsequently elected; powers and duties.

Trustees elected subsequent to the adoption of the resolution or the petition provided for in section 31-536 shall be bound thereby, and shall surrender their office as provided for in section 31-538.

SourceLaws 1941, c. 56, ยง 7, p. 257;C.S.Supp.,1941, ยง 31-636;R.S.1943, ยง 31-542.
